content: granny brimmed hat pattern by koolstitch yarn approx 120 - 150 yards cotton medium weight yarn sugar n cream also works well with this pattern hook f - 3 75mm instruction this hat can be worn with either a brim down or rolled up flat circle for the top of the hat make a magic_ring for how-to please refer to this video tutorial  round 1 chain 1 7 single_crochet through the loop do not join place marker and work a continual round  round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 14 single_crochet  round 3 *1 single_crochet in the next stitch 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 21 single_crochet  round 4 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 28 single_crochet  round 5 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 35 single_crochet  round 6 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 4 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 42 single_crochet  round 7 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 49 single_crochet  round 8 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 6 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 56 single_crochet  round 9 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 7 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 63 single_crochet  round 10 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 8 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 70 single_crochet  round 11 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 9 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 77 single_crochet  round 12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 77 single_crochet  round 13 *1 single_crochet in each of the next 10 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch continue around from * 84 single_crochet  round 14 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 84 single_crochet slip_stitch to the next 2 stitches you can adjust this flat top to fit your head by adding more or subtracting the last round 84 sts hat body  round 1 chain 3 2 double_crochet in the same stitch skip 2 stitches *3 double_crochet in the next stitch skip 2 stitches repeat from * till the last shell join with slip_stitch to the beginning chain 28 shells - 84 sts  round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in the same space *3 double_crochet in the next space repeat from * to the last space join with slip_stitch to the beginning chain 28 shells - 84 sts  from round 3 repeat round 2 until you get the desired length hat brim  round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet in the next 5 stitches 2 single_crochet in the next stitch *single_crochet in the 6 next stitches
